title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Cat had recently moved to a flat in Fettes Row. It was on the third floor of a Georgian block, reached by a winding common stair that connected the landings of each flat.

title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: 'Of course.' Isabel had heard that Cat had taken a flatmate when she moved into Fettes Row, but she knew nothing about her other than that she came from St Andrews  and that she played golf, which almost everyone in St Andrews  did. This information  had  come  from  Eddie,  who  had  met  Claudia when  she came into the delicatessen.
